summary: A former bank robber is released after 10 years in prison. He gets help from a social-worker, but gets harassed by an old cop from his past.
cast: Jean Gabin|Alain Delon|Mimsy Farmer|Victor Lanoux|Cécile Vassort|Ilaria Occhini|Guido Alberti|Malka Ribowska|Christine Fabréga|Gérard Depardieu|Robert Castel|Albert Augier|Maurice Barrier|Paul Beauvais|Gabriel Briand|Pierre Collet|Jean-Pierre Honoré|Patrick Lancelot|Raymond Loyer|Jacques Marchand|Armand Mestral|Roland Monod|Dominique Zardi|Jacques Monod|Bernard Giraudeau|Michel Bouquet|Robert André|Lucie Arnold|Pierre Asso|Jean Degrave|Nicole Desailly|Michel Fortin|Charles Millot|Bernard Musson|Jacques Pisias|Jacques Rispal|Jean Rougeul|André Rouyer|Gilbert Servien|Frank Stuart
keywords: loss of wife|car crash|injustice|french justice|dying young
title: Dos hombres en la ciudad
